tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE prescription_drug_usage (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    patient_id UUID,
    pharmacy_id UUID,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE prescription_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    drug_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    prescribed_amount INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PrescriptionTransactions (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  drug_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE BlockchainTransactions (
  block_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT REFERENCES PrescriptionTransactions(transaction_id) NOT NULL,
  block_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  previous_block_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PrescriptionHistory (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  drug_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
  block_id INT REFERENCES BlockchainTransactions(block_id) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drug_prescriptions (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  drug_name VARCHAR(50),
  prescribed_date TIMESTAMP,
  dosage INT
);

CREATE TABLE drug_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  prescription_id INT,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  pharmacy_id INT,
  quantity INT
);
